title: Change app-wide background color to bright magenta

requirements.text: Update the global theme color tokens so the entire app background uses a bright magenta color instead of the current bright cyan, in both light and dark modes. Apply the change via the CSS variables used by Tailwind (`--background` and any directly related surface tokens such as `--card`, `--popover`, `--border`, `--input`, and `--ring`) in `frontend/src/index.css`, ensuring foreground/text contrast remains readable.

quotes: change the background colour to bright_magenta

acceptanceCriteria: In light mode, the page/body background renders as bright magenta (not cyan) across the app.
In dark mode, the page/body background renders as a magenta-themed dark variant (not cyan) across the app.
Text and key UI surfaces (cards/popovers) remain clearly readable against the new magenta background (no low-contrast foreground).

constraints: Do not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose them only).
Do not change any files listed in `frontend.immutablePaths` from SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend must remain single-actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Adding new pages or features beyond the background/theme color change
